==Dutch== ===Etymology=== Related to {{m|nl|krenken||to hurt}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|nl|Nl-krank.ogg|Audio}} ===Adjective=== {{nl-adj}} # {{lb|nl|archaic}} [[sick]], [[ill]] #: {{syn|nl|ziek}} ====Inflection==== {{nl-decl-adj}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|nl|gezond}} * {{l|nl|genezen}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|nl|krankzinnig}}, {{l|nl|krankenhuis}} ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|krank}}, from {{inh|de|goh|*krank}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*krangaz}}, {{m|gem-pro|*krankaz||crooked, weak}}. Akin to {{cog|en|crank}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/kʁaŋk/}} * {{audio|de|De-krank.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-krank.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{rhymes|de|aŋk}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|kränker|kränksten}} # [[sick]]; [[ill]] # (''[[slang]]'') [[excellent]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj|krank|kränker|kränkst}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|siech}} {{i|archaic}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|gesund}} * {{l|de|heil}} ====Hyponyms==== {{hyp-top|Hyponyms}} * {{l|de|augenkrank}} * {{l|de|geisteskrank}} * {{l|de|herzkrank}} {{hyp-mid}} * {{l|de|krebskrank}} * {{l|de|lungenkrank}} * {{l|de|magenkrank}} {{hyp-bottom}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|erkranken}} * {{l|de|kränkeln}} * {{l|de|Krankenhaus}} * {{l|de|Krankenkasse}} * {{l|de|Krankenschwester}} * {{l|de|Krankenversicherung}} * {{l|de|Krankenwagen}} * {{l|de|Krankheit}} * {{l|de|krankmelden}} * {{l|de|Krankmeldung}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|hrx|gmh|krank}}, from {{inh|hrx|goh|*krank}}, from {{inh|hrx|gem-pro|*krangaz}}, {{m|gem-pro|*krankaz||crooked, weak}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/kraŋk/}} ===Adjective=== {{head|hrx|adjective|comparative|krenker|superlative|krenkest}} # [[ill]], [[sick]] #: {{ux|hrx|Sie sin '''krank'''.|They are '''sick'''.}} #: {{ux|hrx|Die '''kranke''' Leit sin im Hospital.|The '''sick''' people are in the hospital.}} #: {{ux|hrx|Unser Hund is '''krank'''.|Our dog is '''sick'''.}} ====Declension==== {{hrx-decl-adj|krank}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|hrx|gesund}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|hrx|Krankheet|g=f}} * {{l|hrx|Krankheit|g=f}} ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary] ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|lb|gmh|kranc}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/kʀɑŋk/}} ** {{rhymes|lb|ɑŋk}} ===Adjective=== {{lb-adj}} # [[ill]], [[sick]] ====Declension==== {{lb-decl-adj}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|lb|gesond}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|lb|Kränkt}} * {{l|lb|Krankheet}} * {{l|lb|Krankeschäin}} * {{l|lb|Krankekeess}} ---- ==Plautdietsch== ===Adjective=== {{head|pdt|adjective}} # [[ill]], [[sick]] ====Derived terms==== * {{l|pdt|Krankenbad|g=n}} * {{l|pdt|Krankheit|g=f}}
